answers.answer: The question is could you be pregnant?  Morning sickness is one of the tell tale signs of pregnancy!  You may want to go out and get a home pregnancy test and take it just to make sure!

Hi, Lenny.  Sometimes mornings, for me, are difficult because I have a generalized anxiety disorder.  I feel better during the late evening.  Are you having any issues with anxiety and/or depression?  If so, it can affect how you feel (sometimes mornings are worse), and you might feel nauseous.  If this is the case, have you consulted with a counselor/therapist?  If this is not the case, then maybe a consultation with a gastroenterologist (deals with digestive disorders) might help.  Good luck.Ellen
could you be pregnant? morning sickness is a common sign of pregnancy.  otherwise it may be a gastrointestinal issue that a doctor needs to diagnose.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Commonest cause of chronic nausea and morning nausea is acidity, apart from ofcourse pregnancy in women. Take omeprazole (empty stomach in morning) and antacid gel and see if it helps. Liver and kidney dysfunction is another cause. Hence kidney and liver function tests should be done. Other causes are diabetes and hypothyroidism. Electrolyte imbalance too can cause nausea. IBS, gluten or lactose intolerance, parasites in gut too can be the cause. A stool test should be done for worms, giardiasis etc. Also if nothing is found then food challenge test to detect food intolerance should be done.Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral if required. Hope this helps. Take care!

question: what does it mean when your always nausious?expecially in the morning.Even when i eat in the morning i feel like i want to throw up, so i can never get myself to eat in the mornings, so i know i cant be nausiated because i dont eat in the mornings.what can it be?
title: not feeling well
